Source: createNS.js

// const set = require('./set')

import { set } from './set.js'

var xmlns = xmlns || "http://www.w3.org/2000/svg";

/**
 * 
 * @param {string} type 
 * @param {object} obj 
 * @param {object} document usually the document, but we may need to specify this e.g. if using JSDOM 
 * @returns {HTMLElement} 
 */

var createNS = function(type, obj, container=document){
    let element = container.createElementNS(xmlns, type)
    set(element, obj)
    return element
}

// module.exports = createNS;

export { createNS }
